Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Updated the interface, and Preview window. Added the ability to import PNG files.

English.Char_Desc_45: A gif animator and slide show creator.
English.Char_Desc_80: An easy to use gif animator and slide show creator.
English.Char_Desc_250:
An easy to use gif animator, movie, and slide show creator. Set the images to be a fixed size for easier viewing. Just load your images into the list, and press create. That is how easy it is to use.
Supports jpg, jpeg, png, and bmp images.
English.Char_Desc_450:
An easy to use gif animator, movie, and slide show creator. Just load your images into the list, and press create. That is how easy it is to use.
Set the images to be a fixed size for easier viewing. Create Gif movies with just one click of a button.
Supports jpg, jpeg, png, and bmp images. No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
An easy to use gif animator, movie, and slide show creator. Just load your images into the list, and press create. That is how easy it is to use.
Set the images to be a fixed size for easier viewing. Create Gif movies with just one click of a button. Individual interval times may now also be set for custom viewing.
Run this application with administrator rights for best performance and user experience. Supports jpg, jpeg, png, and bmp images.
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software. Saving the planet one bit at a time...
